name: The Doggo Of Us
description:
This is our entry submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 - The Doggo of Us.

The world as we know it has ended & the streets are flooded with zombies, as a survivor you'll need to make a break for it to survive... Except there is one problem...

You are not alone in your quest for survival, you have your best friend, problem is he's a  dog, and where you see a  gruesome  zombies, he sees bones and plenty of new friends!
So try as hard as you can to stay alive but be careful because as your dog will try to pull you towards the flesh eating marauders!
Dodge the zombies and survive to try and get the highest score possible!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Space - Continue (Menu/Retry)

Disclaimer:
No dogs were harmed during the development of this game, but we can't guarantee they won't have a stomach-ache after eating too many zombie bones...

These lost souls made the game:

  • Astroneer
  • Arcades Saboth
  • JakeThorne - @JakeThorne_
  • Jush (https://cephalo.io/)
  • messmerd (https://soundcloud.com/messmerd)
  • SadKing - @AnwyllJames
  • SuperIzzo
